name: Standard Soy Wax Tarts
description: Traditional tart shape and size. Colours vary between fragrances, but if you prefer to have your tart uncoloured, please just let me know. All soy wax tarts are made to order to achieve optimum freshness and sealed straight away to lock in scents. Advanges of soy wax tarts 1. Soy is extracted naturally from American fields, ensuring that farmers are benefitting from soy being used. 2. Soy wax lasts a long time - they offer at least 9 hours of fragrance. 3. Soy wax produces less smoke than a normal candle or oil. 4. Soy wax distributes the scent more than usual candles. How to use: Pop the tart into the top of your oil burner on it's own (no water). Then place a tea light into the oil burner and the fragrance will fill the room. These last ages - to remove/change scents you can pop the oil burner into the freezer for 10 minutes and pop out or burn for a few seconds whilst the bottom melts and pop out.

options.name: *LUSH dupe* Rockstar
*LUSH dupe* Karma
*LUSH dupe* Avobath
*LUSH dupe* Bathos
*LUSH dupe* Snow Fairy
*LUSH dupe* Jungle
*LUSH dupe* American Cream
Vicks Menthol - A copy of the famous flu and cold remedy.
Cinammon - A spicy, woody and warm sweet cinnamon fragrance
Cherry - Doesn't smell exactly like cherries i must admit, but it’s a beautiful sweet, light scent.
Mango - Lovely summery fragrance. One of the best.
Tangerine - Tangy tangerine scent, definitely one for a warm day!!
Kiwi & Lime -  Yummy blend of the two gorgeous fruity scents.Kiwi & Lime. Yummy blend of the two gorgeous fruity scents.
Vanilla Lemon - A sharp and fresh lemon fragrance.
Monkey Farts - Based of everything a monkey might eat. Includes a blend of bananas, grapefruit, mango, kiwi, mixed berries and coconut!
Passion Melon - A sweet summery blend of passion fruit and honeydew melon. Very crisp and light!
Babys Breath - A fresh fruity floral blend of carnation, vanilla, apples and melon.
Rose & Lavender - Smells like turkish delight, its my favourite! (Discontinued soon)!
Fresh Cut Roses - A beautiful gentle fragrance of soft dewy roses, fresh from the garden.
Odour Eliminator - A fresh, odour banishing aroma. Perfect for use after cooking, where there are smokers, pets, stinky trainers etc.
Strawberry Jam - Gorgeous sweet jam scent that can never go wrong!
Fresh Cream - Exactly what it says, yummy!
Chocolate Banoffee - A sinfully delicious treat: rich milk chocolate, sweet toffee, ripe bananas, whipped cream and buttery pie crust.
Chocolate Chip Cookie - Fresh Chocolate Cookies straight from the Oven.
Bubblegum - Gorgeous pink bubblegum scent! Low stock!
Rhubard and Custard - Recapture your childhood with this accurate sweet scent.
Yuletide - A mixture of orange, lemons, cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, with balsam, pine, fir, spruce, pine cones and a hint of fresh snow.

name: Snap Apart Soy Wax Bars
description: Snap apart wax bars. Enough for 6 different uses! Colours vary between fragrances. All soy wax tarts are made to order to achieve optimum freshness and sealed straight away to lock in scents. Advanges of soy wax tarts 1. Then place a tea light into the oil burner and the fragrance will fill the room. These last ages - to remove/change scents you can pop the oil burner into the freezer for 10 minutes and pop out or burn for a few seconds whilst the bottom melts and pop out.

name: Floral Mini Tarts - Pack of 6
description: Perfect for the oil burners with shallow wells. Pack of 6 beautifully shaped tarts, in a variety of fragrances. Great size to mix and match and make cocktails! Colours may vary between fragrances. All soy wax tarts are made to order to achieve optimum freshness and sealed straight away to lock in scents. Advanges of soy wax tarts 1. Soy is extracted naturally from American fields, ensuring that farmers are benefitting from soy being used. 2. Soy wax lasts a long time - they offer at least 9 hours of fragrance. 3. Soy wax produces less smoke than a normal candle or oil. 4. Soy wax distributes the scent more than usual candles. How to use: Pop the tart into the top of your oil burner on it's own (no water). Then place a tea light into the oil burner and the fragrance will fill the room. These last ages - to remove/change scents you can pop the oil burner into the freezer for 10 minutes and pop out or burn for a few seconds whilst the bottom melts and pop out.

options.name: Strawberry Tart - Shortbread scented base, French vanilla whipped cream, strawberry and sauce.
Chocolate Cookie - Sugared Shortbread scented base, French vanilla whipped cream and chocolate chips.
Orange Tart - Shortbread scented base, French vanilla whipped cream and an orange segment.
Cherry Tart - Shortbread scented base, French vanilla whipped cream and a cherry on top!

name: Lemon Curd and Jam Tarts - Pack of 2
